summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were higher on Thursday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Jan. 12
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were higher on Thursday, with all 19 gaining.
Bitcoin rose 7.5% to $18,857 by market close.
